course_details: C programming is a foundational course covering the fundamentals of the C programming language for software development.
Introduction to Algorithms (CLRS) is a renowned textbook providing an in-depth exploration of computer algorithms and their applications.
C++ for DSA is a course or book teaching C++ programming within the context of data structures and algorithms
Basic data structures are fundamental organizational techniques in computer science, including arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues, for managing data efficiently.
Introduction to OOP Python covers object-oriented programming principles and their application in Python programming.
Software engineering involves systematically designing, developing, and maintaining software applications to meet specific user needs.
AWS (Amazon Web Services) is a leading provider of cloud computing services, offering a wide range of on-demand computing resources.
MySQL is an open-source relational database management system known for its speed, reliability, and ease of use.
Problem-solving involves analyzing, designing, and implementing solutions to address challenges or achieve specific objectives effectively.
